import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link, useHistory } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Row, Col, Card, CardHeader, CardBody, FormGroup, Label, Input, Button, InputGroup, InputGroupAddon, CardFooter, Form, FormFeedback } from 'reactstrap'; import { AppSwitch } from '@coreui/react' import '../../../global.css'; import api from '../../../../src/services/api'; export default function Modulo() { const [nomeModulo, setnomeModulo] = useState(''); const [descricao, setdescricao] = useState(''); const [ativo, setAtivo] = useState(1); const [usuarioId, setusuarioId] = useState('0000-00-00'); const [dataultmodif, setDataultmodif] = useState('0000-00-00'); const history = useHistory(); async function handleRegister(e) { e.preventDefault(); const data = { nomeModulo, descricao, ativo, usuarioId, dataultmodif }; try { console.log(data); const response = await api.post('/usuario', data); alert(`Seu login de acesso: ${response.data.login}`); history.push('/'); } catch (err) { alert('Erro no cadastro, tente novamente.'); } } return (
Módulo novo Dados de Acesso
); }
